definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger

sentences.english: As an ambassador plenipotentiary he represents the diplomatic image of his country.
sentences.chinese: 作爲全權大使，他代表的是國家的外交形象。

sentences.english: He is a peacekeeping ambassador plenipotentiary designated by the United Union, he has full powers.
sentences.chinese: 他是由聯合國派出的維和全權大使，他有全權證書。
